text.ja_jp: 気まぐれフォレストへようこそ

text.en_us: Okay.... But why am I here? And who are you anyway?
text.de_de: Okay. But why am I here? And who are you anyway?
text.ja_jp: あの…なぜここに居るんだ？ちなみに、君はだれなの？

text.en_us: I'm the blind fox Takumi, and you're here to test out this demo.
text.de_de: I'm a blind fox named Takumi, but you're here to test out this demo.
text.ja_jp: オレは目の見えないキツネのタクミだよ。タロウはこのデモを試すために居るんだ。

text.en_us: So...this is all just a game then?
text.de_de: So...this is all just a game then?
text.ja_jp: つまり…これはただのゲームだよね？

text.en_us: Yup. But it's just a short demo.
text.de_de: Yup. But it's just a short demo.
So, how do I play it?
text.ja_jp: じゃあ、ゲームの仕方は？

text.en_us: If you are new to the demo and use a gamepad, press the start button to access the pause menu. For keyboard users, press 'P' and on smartphone devices tap on yourself and then the settings icon.
text.de_de: If you are new to the demo and use a gamepad, press the start button to access the pause menu. For keyboard users, press 'P' and on smartphone devices tap on yourself and then the settings icon.
text.ja_jp: ゲームパッドを使う初めの方はスタートボタンをおすと、一時停止メニュへのアクセスができる。キーボードの場合は『P』をおし、スマートフォンを使う方は画面に現れるタロウを直接にタップして『設定』のアイコンもタップするんだ。

text.en_us: In the menu select Settings -> Controls -> Layout
text.de_de: In the menu select Settings -> Controls -> Layout
text.ja_jp: ながれは『メニュー＞＞設定＞＞操作＞＞レイアウト』

text.en_us: Alright. Are we the only ones here?
text.de_de: Alright. Are we the only ones here?
text.ja_jp: わかった。ここには二人きりだよね？

text.en_us: Actually, this forest has some dangerous creatures to watch out for, so you should explore the area and look for weapons or items to help you fight them off.
text.de_de: Actually, this forest has some dangerous creatures to watch out for, so you should explore the area and look for weapons or items to help you fight them off.
text.ja_jp: 実はこのフォレストに危険な生き物が居るので、自分を守るためにフォレストに武器やアイテムを探った方が良い。
はい、りょうかい。ありがとう。
